channel.title: Everything to start a server (AIO v2)
channel.description:
Hello!
I'm sure most of you will remember my "Everything to start a server V1" back a few months ago.
Well, Guess what? I've decided to release a V2!
Link to V1 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,362357.0.html]Here[/url]
[u] What this package includes[/u]
[ul][li] Everything you need to start a server[/li] [li] Java basics[/li] [li] A few useful sources[/li] [li] Hosting programs [/li] [li] Useful Tutorials [/li][/ul]
[b]FAQ[/b]
Q: wat is dis A: This is an AIO (All in one) Package that includes everything you need to start a server! Q: u maek new chzbrgr? A: No. Q: How i use????????????????????????? A:
Download it at the link below.
Open it You should see: [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/2e3z6oj.png[/img] Click Install [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/r7u45f.png[/img] Wait till its finished. [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/2mnitrd.png[/img]
It should be on your desktop.
Q: How do I use it on ubuntu? A: I'll upload a tutorial as soon as I boot into ubuntu.
[u] Download links[/u] [url=http://www.jakiel-networks.com/uploads/Lewks AIO.exe]Mirror #1[/url]
If you wish to upload a mirror, please do.
